import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Header from '../header/header'; import CardsPreview from './Types/CardsPreview'; import LightVersionCard from './Types/LightVersionCards'; import './Cards.css'; import CardBg from '../../images/Card_Container.png' import CardBg2 from '../../images/Card_Container2.png' import BackArrow from '../../images/Arrow_Back.svg'; class Cards extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { header: [ { title: 'Cards & Payments' } ], boxShadow: "0 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)", width: "100%", height: "200px", cardNo: "4321 0987 0000 9876", title1: "current balance", title2: "Benjamin Parker", date: "03/24", borderRadius: "8px", price: "$3 458.90", icon: "Visa", className: "cards flex-div", opacity: "0.64" } } render() { return (
Cards Preview
Light Version
); } } export default Cards;
